name: Tequeños
description: Tequeños stuffed with cheese served with creamy guacamole, offering a perfect blend of crispy dough and melted cheese for a delightful appetizer.

name: Causa rellena
description: Causa rellena made with layers of mashed potatoes, avocado, and tuna or chicken, topped with mayonnaise and garnished with olives and eggs, providing a savory and refreshing starter.

name: Rocoto relleno
description: Rocoto relleno features a spicy rocoto pepper stuffed with a mixture of ground beef, onions, peanuts, and spices, baked with a creamy cheese topping for a bold and flavorful dish.

name: Papa a la huancaína
description: Papa a la huancaína consists of boiled potatoes served with a creamy, spicy cheese sauce made from ají amarillo, milk, and fresh cheese, garnished with olives and boiled eggs.

name: Tamales de pollo
description: Tamales de pollo are made from corn dough filled with seasoned chicken, wrapped in banana leaves, and steamed to perfection, offering a moist and flavorful treat.

name: Papa rellena
description: Papa rellena is a fried mashed potato stuffed with a savory mixture of ground beef, onions, raisins, and hard-boiled eggs, delivering a hearty and comforting appetizer.

name: Crema de rocoto
description: Crema de rocoto is a spicy and creamy sauce made from rocoto peppers, cheese, and milk, typically served as a dip or spread for various starters.

name: Choclo con queso
description: Choclo con queso pairs large-kernel Andean corn with fresh cheese, offering a simple yet satisfying combination of flavors and textures, perfect as a starter or side dish.

name: Yuca rellena
description: Yuca rellena features fried cassava stuffed with a flavorful mix of ground beef, onions, and spices, providing a crunchy and satisfying start to any meal.

name: Ensalada de palta
description: Ensalada de palta is a fresh and nutritious avocado salad, mixed with tomatoes, onions, and lettuce, dressed with lime juice and olive oil, perfect for a light start to your meal.

name: Solterito
description: Solterito is a refreshing salad made with a mix of fresh vegetables, such as corn, beans, olives, and cheese, dressed with olive oil and lime, perfect as a light starter.

name: Salchipapa
description: Salchipapa is a popular street food dish consisting of fried sausages and crispy fries, topped with a variety of sauces, making it a flavorful and indulgent starter.

name: Palta rellena
description: Palta rellena is a delicious stuffed avocado dish, filled with a mixture of vegetables and mayonnaise, offering a creamy and nutritious appetizer.

name: Humitas
description: Humitas are a traditional dish made from fresh corn dough filled with cheese, wrapped in corn husks, and steamed to perfection, providing a warm and comforting start to any meal.

name: Ocopa
description: Ocopa is a traditional Peruvian dish consisting of boiled potatoes covered in a creamy, spicy sauce made from ají amarillo, cheese, and peanuts, garnished with boiled eggs and olives.

name: Lomo saltado
description: Lomo saltado is a traditional Peruvian stir-fry dish combining beef, onions, tomatoes, and spices, served with crispy fries and steamed rice for a savory and hearty meal.

name: Pollo a la brasa
description: Pollo a la brasa is a classic rotisserie chicken dish marinated in Peruvian spices and cooked to perfection, served with crispy fries and fresh salad.

name: Ají de gallina
description: Ají de gallina is a creamy chicken stew made with shredded chicken, milk, bread, and yellow chili pepper, served with boiled potatoes, rice, and olives.

name: Anticuchos
description: Anticuchos are skewers of marinated beef heart grilled to perfection, served with boiled potatoes and corn, offering a smoky and flavorful experience.

name: Cuy al horno
description: Cuy al horno is a traditional dish featuring roasted guinea pig, seasoned with herbs and spices, and served with potatoes and salad for a unique and hearty meal.

name: Adobo arequipeño
description: Adobo arequipeño is a rich and hearty pork stew marinated with chicha de jora, garlic, and Peruvian spices, slow-cooked to perfection and served with boiled potatoes.

name: Carapulcra
description: Carapulcra is a traditional stew made from dried potatoes and pork, slow-cooked with peanuts, chili peppers, and spices for a flavorful and hearty dish.

name: Seco de cordero
description: Seco de cordero is a flavorful lamb stew made with cilantro, beer, and spices, slow-cooked until tender, and served with beans and rice.

name: Tacu tacu
description: Tacu tacu is a traditional Peruvian dish made from a mixture of rice and beans, fried to a crispy texture and served with a fried egg on top.

name: Pachamanca
description: Pachamanca is a traditional Andean dish cooked underground, consisting of a variety of meats, potatoes, corn, and herbs, offering a rich and smoky flavor.

name: Estofado de pollo
description: Estofado de pollo is a comforting chicken stew cooked with carrots, peas, and potatoes in a tomato-based sauce, served with steamed rice.

name: Ajiaco de papas
description: Ajiaco de papas is a traditional potato stew made with a variety of potatoes, milk, and cheese, seasoned with herbs and served with steamed rice.

name: Cau cau
description: Cau cau is a traditional Peruvian tripe stew cooked with potatoes and yellow chili pepper, served with steamed rice for a hearty meal.

name: Olluquito con charqui
description: Olluquito con charqui is a traditional Andean dish made with olluco (a tuber) and dried meat, cooked together in a flavorful stew and served with steamed rice.

name: Chicharrón de cerdo
description: Chicharrón de cerdo is a traditional dish of crispy fried pork served with boiled corn, sweet potatoes, and fresh salsa criolla for a delicious and satisfying meal.

name: Tallarin verde
description: Tallarin verde is a Peruvian version of pesto pasta made with spinach, basil, and queso fresco, served with a tender steak on top.

name: Puré de papa
description: Puré de papa is a creamy mashed potato dish, served as a side with various Peruvian main courses, often topped with a grilled chicken leg.

name: Arroz con pollo
description: Arroz con pollo is a traditional Peruvian dish where chicken is cooked with a cilantro-infused rice, often served with a side of salsa criolla.

name: Arroz chaufa
description: Arroz chaufa is a Peruvian-Chinese fusion dish featuring stir-fried rice mixed with chicken, vegetables, and soy sauce, offering a savory and aromatic meal.

name: Tallarin rojo
description: Tallarin rojo is a Peruvian-style spaghetti cooked in a rich tomato sauce with onions, garlic, and spices, often served with a fried chicken leg on top.

name: Leche de tigre
description: Leche de tigre is a citrus-based marinade used to cure fish in ceviche, often served as a shot or in a glass with seafood.

name: Jalea de mariscos
description: Jalea de mariscos is a popular Peruvian dish made of deep-fried seafood served with a side of fried yuca and a tangy salsa criolla.

name: Tiradito
description: Tiradito is a Peruvian dish of raw fish, sliced thinly and served with a spicy, tangy sauce, similar to ceviche but without onions.

name: Sudado de pescado
description: Sudado de pescado is a flavorful Peruvian fish stew made with fresh fish, tomatoes, onions, and a blend of spices.

name: Trucha frita
description: Trucha frita is a dish of fried trout, typically served with potatoes, rice, and a side of salad.

name: Chicharrón de calamar
description: Chicharrón de calamar is a popular Peruvian dish of deep-fried calamari rings, served with lemon and tartar sauce.

name: Parihuela
description: Parihuela is a hearty Peruvian seafood stew made with a variety of seafood, fish, and vegetables, cooked in a rich broth.

name: Ceviche
description: Ceviche is a classic Peruvian dish made with fresh raw fish marinated in lime juice, mixed with onions, cilantro, and served with corn and sweet potatoes.

name: Arroz con mariscos
description: Arroz con mariscos is a Peruvian seafood rice dish, similar to paella, made with a variety of seafood, rice, and a rich, flavorful sauce.

name: Choritos a la chalaca
description: Choritos a la chalaca is a popular Peruvian appetizer made with mussels topped with a mixture of onions, tomatoes, corn, and lime juice.

name: Pescado a lo macho
description: Pescado a lo macho is a traditional Peruvian dish featuring a fish fillet topped with a spicy seafood sauce made with shrimp, squid, and other seafood.

name: Tacu tacu de mariscos
description: Tacu tacu de mariscos is a hearty dish combining the traditional Peruvian tacu tacu (a mixture of rice and beans) with a flavorful seafood sauce.

name: Pulpo al olivo
description: Pulpo al olivo is a Peruvian dish made with octopus drizzled with a creamy olive sauce, served with potatoes or a fresh salad.

name: Cangrejos rellenos
description: Cangrejos rellenos are a delicious dish of crab shells filled with a seasoned crab meat mixture, often served as an appetizer.

name: Langostinos al ajillo
description: Langostinos al ajillo is a flavorful dish of shrimp sautéed in garlic, white wine, and butter, often served with bread or rice.

name: Chupe de camarones
description: Chupe de camarones is a traditional Peruvian shrimp chowder made with shrimp, potatoes, milk, and spices, topped with a poached egg.

name: Sopa de quinua
description: Sopa de quinua is a hearty and nutritious soup made with quinoa, vegetables, and sometimes chicken or beef for added flavor.

name: Sopa criolla
description: Sopa criolla is a traditional Peruvian soup made with beef, noodles, milk, and spices, often topped with a fried egg.

name: Sopa seca
description: Sopa seca is a Peruvian dish that translates to 'dry soup,' made with spiced noodles cooked in a flavorful broth until the liquid is absorbed.

name: Sopa a la minuta
description: Sopa a la minuta is a quick and simple Peruvian soup made with ground beef, noodles, milk, and eggs.

name: Sopa de olluco
description: Sopa de olluco is a traditional Andean soup made with olluco tubers, potatoes, and beef, seasoned with a blend of Peruvian spices.

name: Caldo de cabeza
description: Caldo de cabeza is a hearty soup made with a sheep's head, flavored with herbs and vegetables, and often served with a side of corn.

name: Caldo de gallina
description: Caldo de gallina is a nourishing Peruvian chicken soup made with whole pieces of chicken, potatoes, and a rich, flavorful broth.

name: Sopa de choros
description: Sopa de choros is a delicious soup made with fresh mussels, potatoes, and a variety of Peruvian spices.

name: Sopa de mondongo
description: Sopa de mondongo is a traditional Peruvian soup made with tripe, potatoes, and a mix of spices, often enjoyed as a hearty meal.

name: Sopa de pescado
description: Sopa de pescado is a flavorful fish soup made with fresh fish, potatoes, and a variety of Peruvian spices.

name: Sopa de trigo
description: Sopa de trigo is a nutritious Peruvian soup made with wheat grains, vegetables, and sometimes meat, seasoned with herbs and spices.

name: Sopa de frijoles
description: Sopa de frijoles is a hearty bean soup, popular in Peru, made with beans, vegetables, and a rich broth, sometimes including chorizo.

name: Caldo verde peruano
description: Caldo verde peruano is a Peruvian version of the classic green broth, made with potatoes, leafy greens, and sometimes chorizo or other meat.

name: Sopa teóloga
description: Sopa teóloga is a rich and flavorful Peruvian soups made with a variety of meats, potatoes, and a unique blend of spices, often served on special occasions.

name: Suspiro Limeño
description: Suspiro Limeño is a traditional Peruvian dessert made with a creamy base of sweetened milk, topped with a fluffy meringue.

name: Mazamorra Morada
description: Mazamorra Morada is a classic Peruvian dessert made from purple corn, mixed with fruits and spices, resulting in a thick, flavorful pudding.

name: Arroz con Leche
description: Arroz con Leche is a creamy rice pudding dessert made with milk, sugar, and cinnamon, offering a comforting and sweet flavor.

name: Tres Leches
description: Tres Leches is a moist cake soaked in three types of milk: evaporated milk, condensed milk, and heavy cream, topped with whipped cream.

name: Picarones
description: Picarones are Peruvian doughnuts made from squash and sweet potato, fried to a golden crisp and drizzled with chancaca syrup.

name: Alfajores
description: Alfajores are delicate sandwich cookies filled with creamy dulce de leche and dusted with powdered sugar.

name: King Kong de Piura
description: King Kong de Piura is a traditional Peruvian layered cake made with manjar blanco, pineapple jam, and a crispy biscuit.

name: Torta Helada
description: Torta Helada is a refreshing Peruvian dessert made with layers of sponge cake and fruit-flavored gelatin, topped with cream.

name: Selva Negra
description: Selva Negra is a rich and decadent chocolate cake layered with whipped cream and cherries, a Peruvian take on the classic Black Forest cake.

name: Turrones de Doña Pepa
description: Turrones de Doña Pepa is a traditional Peruvian dessert made with layers of anise-flavored dough, covered with honey and colorful sprinkles.

name: Queso Helado
description: Queso Helado is a traditional Peruvian dessert from Arequipa, made with a mix of milk, coconut, and cinnamon, frozen to perfection.

name: Cocadas
description: Cocadas are sweet coconut macaroons that are crispy on the outside and chewy on the inside, made with shredded coconut and condensed milk.

name: Leche Asada
description: Leche Asada is a traditional Peruvian dessert similar to flan, made by baking sweetened milk and eggs to create a caramelized top.

name: Pudín
description: Pudín is a Peruvian bread pudding made with leftover bread, milk, and spices, baked to a golden perfection.

name: Crema Volteada
description: Crema Volteada is a Peruvian-style caramel flan, rich and smooth, with a golden caramel topping.

name: Pisco Sour
description: Pisco Sour is Peru's iconic cocktail made with Pisco, lime juice, simple syrup, egg white, and Angostura bitters.

name: Chicha Morada
description: Chicha Morada is a traditional non-alcoholic beverage made from purple corn, pineapple, cinnamon, and cloves.

name: Chicha de Jora
description: Chicha de Jora is a traditional fermented corn beer from the Andes, known for its rich flavor and historical significance.

name: Inca Kola
description: Inka Kola is a popular Peruvian soda with a sweet, fruity flavor, often described as 'the taste of Peru'.

name: Mate de Coca
description: Mate de Coca is a traditional herbal tea made from coca leaves, known for its refreshing taste and medicinal properties.

name: Cusqueña
description: Cusqueña is a premium Peruvian beer, known for its smooth taste and high-quality ingredients, brewed in Cusco.

name: Chilcano
description: Chilcano is a refreshing cocktail made with Pisco, ginger ale, lime juice, and a dash of bitters.

name: Algarrobina
description: Algarrobina is a sweet and creamy cocktail made with Pisco, algarrobina syrup, milk, and egg yolk.

name: Emoliente
description: Emoliente is a traditional Peruvian herbal drink made from barley, flaxseed, and a mix of medicinal herbs.

name: Pisco Punch
description: Pisco Punch is a classic cocktail made with Pisco, pineapple juice, lemon juice, and sugar syrup.

name: Maracuyá Sour
description: Maracuyá Sour is a fruity twist on the classic Pisco Sour, made with fresh passion fruit juice, Pisco, and lime.

name: Sangría Peruana
description: Sangría Peruana is a refreshing cocktail made with red wine, Pisco, fruit juice, and fresh fruit.

name: Aguaymanto Sour
description: Aguaymanto Sour is a variation of the Pisco Sour made with aguaymanto (goldenberry) juice, giving it a tangy and sweet flavor.

name: Daiquiri de Fresa
description: Daiquiri de Fresa is a refreshing cocktail made with fresh strawberries, rum, lime juice, and sugar syrup.

name: Coca Sour
description: Coca Sour is a unique Peruvian cocktail made with coca leaf-infused Pisco, lime juice, and simple syrup.
